column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We take our 8th grade students to Café Ba Ba Reeba for a luncheon and I personally adore their food so I called Café Ba Ba Reeba for help. I spoke to co-owner
column6: helpful and equally as excited about our students tasting tapas. They arranged to have the pieces cut
column8: and packaged in containers so I could fit them over night in my fridge. They included the "special sauce" on the side and a tray to serve them on. Allison made sure that I refrigerated the tapas
column9: but explained that they are served room temperature.
